name: 03-dependencies
description: * Create a `package.json` file in this folder   * `npm init -y` * Add `"type": "module"` to the `package.json` file   * This will allow us to use `import` and `export` * Install the `date-fns` library * Create a file called `index.js`   * Import at least 3 functions from the `date-fns` library     * See the `date-fns` [website](https://date-fns.org/) for more information   * Use / call those 3 functions
